reviewText:
THIS IS REGION 2 DVD [PAL]
if you live in the united states this will not work in your dvd player.

seller was too lazy to provide this information after multiple requests for verification. i verified this by looking at the back cover.

if you look up the ISBN there are no entries online for the region code. this dvd will only work if you have a dvd player from europe/region 2.

i saw this movie when i was living in korea ten years ago, and it's a banger. if you enjoy revenge flicks you will like this movie. it's somewhat in the same vein as Park Chan Wook's Lady Vengeance (2005) ,  but unique in its own right.
